Specimen Type: Cervical and vaginal cytology cells on glass slides
Purpose: To screen for and diagnose cellular abnormalities, including precancerous and cancerous changes, in gynecologic specimens.
Container: Glass slides fixed immediately with spray fixative or immersed in 95% ethanol (stored in ethanol-filled container until staining)
Equipment: Microscope, cytology staining rack, reagents for Papanicolaou stain, Laboratory Information System
